1.descrip:
Receive $1 Gems immediately and resources every day for 
30 days.
1.subject: Trade License
1.name: Trade License (30 days)

24.descrip: Contains a random character outfit, 2020 Gems, and a large amount of supplies.
24.subject: 2020 Party Dress Lucky Bag
24.descrip_extra:
*After your purchase, the Lucky Bag will be sent to your mailbox. 
*If you receive a ship skin that you already own, you will instead be given the corresponding skin's value in Gems.
24.name: 2020 Party Dress Lucky Bag
